ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( Incident_Title__c ) || ISBLANK( Initial_Report__c ) || ISBLANK( Diagram__c ) || ISBLANK(Location__c) || ISBLANK( Incident_Date__c ) || ISBLANK(Delay_Minutes__c) || ISPICKVAL(Fleet__c,"") || ISPICKVAL( Leading_Half_Set__c ,"") || ISPICKVAL( Trailing_Half_Set__c ,"")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensureIncident Title, Initial Report, Diagram, Location, Incident Date, Delay Minutes, Fleet, Leading Half Set and Trailing Half-Set fields are complete
